definition: agreement of opinions, to be in accord
details:
noun
- agreement of opinions
= synonyms: harmony
- the determination of grammatical inflection on the basis of word relations
= synonyms: agreement
- a harmonious state of things in general and of their properties (as of colors and sounds)
= synonyms: concordance
verb
- to be in accord
= synonyms: hold
- to arrange the words of a text so as to create a concordance
= example: to arrange the words of a text so as to create a concordance
- to arrange by concord or agreement
- to go together
= synonyms: accord
